channel.title: Can i make a shop were you can sell not buy?
channel.description:
can i make a shop were i can sell ENY item OR perhaps SOME items BUT not be able to BUY items from it unless SOMEONE SOLD IT to the shop LIKE A GENERAL STORE?
*please help* *thank you!*

item.title: Can i make a shop were you can sell not buy?
